signature.title: Set up your signature
signature.intro: First you must setup your signature.

uploadSignature.title: Upload your signature
uploadSignature.intro: Tap below to upload your signature. You can only upload .jpeg and .png files

yourSignature.title: Your signature
yourSignature.intro: Your signature is saved to your profile. Now you are ready to continue and sign your company documents.

accountPending.title: We‘ve sent you an email
accountPending.text: With a magic link to the email address you provided. Please click the button on the email to verify your account.
accountPending.introBox: If you didn‘t receive an email please check your spam folder and if it isn‘t there contact us.

additionalServices.title: Additional services
additionalServices.introBox: If you require help with any of the following services below, we will find options for you, which you can choose to explore further or not.
additionalServices.mortgageOptionsQuestion: Can we help find mortgage options for you?
additionalServices.propertyInsuranceQuestion: Can we help find property insurance for you?
additionalServices.property_managementQuestion: Can we help find property management options for you?

companyComplete.title: Well done!
companyComplete.copy: We have all the details we need to set up your company.
companyComplete.info: Your shareholders will receive an email now so they can begin setting up their account on GetGround. In order to speed up your company setup perhaps you would like to encourage them to do so ASAP.

step1.title: Property Address
step1.copy: Please provide the address of the property your company will hold

propertyAddress.heading: Property Address
propertyAddress.intro: Let's start with your property address.

form.error: Please fix your errors to proceed

purchaseDetails.heading: Purchase details
purchaseDetails.heading2: Tell us about your payment schedule
purchaseDetails.intro: Please provide your property purchase details below.

form.newBuildLabel: Is your property a new build
form.completionDateLabel: When is the expected completion date?
form.depositDueLabel: What date is your deposit due?
form.expectedExchangeLabel: Do you have an expected exchange date
form.expectedExchangeDateLabel: Please provide your expected exchange date

choice.addShareholdersContent: Would you like to add shareholders?

add.title: Shareholder's details
add.text:
You can have a maximum of 8 shareholders (including you). All shareholders need to be people not companies.

Please note that each of your shareholders will need to create an account on GetGround. They must also be over 18.

shares.title: Shareholder's details
shares.text: Now it is time to divide company shares between your shareholders and specify which shareholders are directors.
shares.error: Please review the highlighted errors below. It is mandatory to assign shares to all your shareholders, and all the shares allocated need to add up to 100%.

confirm.title: Shareholder's details
confirm.text: Please confirm all the details below are correct

solicitorDetails.title: Solicitor details
solicitorDetails.intro: We need your solicitor details so we can get all the legal documents in order for your property purchase.

label.needSolicitor: Would you like us to help find a solicitor for you?
label.authority: I give permission to GetGround to

manage.title: Manage my company
manage.text: Please let us know what you want to do, we are here to help.

options.buyShares: Make an offer to buy shares
options.withdrawDividend: Take money out of the company (as a dividend)
options.loanRepayment: Take money out of the company (as a director loan repayment)

footer.location: Terranova.network Limited (t/a getGround) is registered in England with Company No. 11273793 and VAT registered. VAT No. 313087625. Registered office: 5 Theale Lakes Business Park, Reading, RG7 4GB.
footer.legal: Terranova.network Limited (t/a getGround) is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (firm reference number 829031) as an AR of Resolution Compliance (firm reference number 574048). Terranova.network Limited (t/a getGround) is registered with the Information Commissioner’s Office under registration number ZA481725 for the purposes of the protection of data.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password

errors.formFail: Sorry we cannot set your new password right now, please try again later

forgotPassword.emailPending: With a magic link to the email address you provided. Please click the button on the email to change your password

form.correctErrors: Please correct all errors to proceed

landing.title: GetGround for smarter property purchasing.
landing.secondaryTitle: Protect your wealth and be tax efficient.
landing.firstParagraph: GetGround makes it easy and affordable to purchase investment property the smarter way – through a company.
landing.secondParagraph: By using our platform you better protect your personal wealth, drive tax efficiency and create more flexibility in how you buy, manage and sell your property.
landing.thirdParagraph: GetGround sets up your company that purchases your investment property. We manage all your company’s on-going needs under one roof.

myDocuments.title: My Documents
myDocuments.intro: Please read and sign all your company documents below. Your shareholders have also been notified that they to sign the relevant documents.
myDocuments.modalDownloadError: We couldn't download the file, please try again

document4.title: Consent to Act as a Director
document4.imageAltText: Consent to Act as a Director

confirmation.heading: Well done
confirmation.copy:
All your documents are signed.

Please remind your shareholders to sign their documents.

accountPending.title: We‘ve sent you an email
accountPending.text: With a magic link to the email address you provided. Please click the button on the email to verify your account.
accountPending.introBox: If you didn‘t receive an email please check your spam folder and if it isn‘t there contact us.

compliance.text: We need to know more about you as an investor, please answer the following four questions.

largeEnterprise.title: Select the statements that apply to you

options.band2: I have under £43 million on my balance sheet
options.band3: I have under £50 million in annual turnover

investmentConfirmation.title: Please confirm that you agree with the following statements

options.band1: I want to buy the property as an investment to rent out to tenants
options.band2: No related party of mine will use the property

selfCertification.title: Which of the following applies to you?

questionnaire.title: Select the statements below that you agree with

options.band1: Property prices don’t always go up in value
options.band2: My investment returns are partly derived from movement in property prices
options.band3: I should put all the money I have into one property
options.band4: There are always buyers willing to pay the price I ask

compliance.modalCheckboxLabel: I’ve read the Investor’s statement letter and confirm that I understand the risk associated with investing.

notSuitable.title: We are sorry!
notSuitable.text: This is a buy to let service, please contact us if you’re not sure GetGround is right for you

compliance.failureMessage: Sorry! You have not passed the quiz. Please try again.

createAccount.title: Account details
createAccount.intro: These details are used to create your account

label.optIn: I would like to receive news and updates from GetGround
label.privacyOne: Creating an account means you accept our

slides.title: Get started
slides.copy:
You’ll create your account in 3 simple steps.

You’ll need your passport and a proof of address at hand.

You can then access your dashboard and start creating companies.

slides.title: Save money
slides.copy:
Owning UK residential investment property in a company can save you money.

With GetGround it has never been cheaper to own and run companies.

slides.title: Save time
slides.copy: We use technology to make setting up and managing a company painless and hassle free.

slides.title: All in one place
slides.copy: Everything your company needs right here at GetGround. Seamless access to other services, such as mortgage and insurance product. Get started now.

confirmation.heading: Well done
confirmation.copy:
Your details have been submitted. You will shortly receive an email with the result of your application.

This typically takes 10 mins but it can take up to a day, so please be patient.
confirmation.contactUsText: If this is taking longer than expected please contact us.

idCheck.title: ID Check
idCheck.text: To prove your identity we need you to take a picture of your passport, proof of address and take a picture of yourself.
idCheck.link: If you already have it saved, upload instead

passport.title: Add a picture of your passport
passport.content: Please make sure you take a picture of the page of your passport that contains your picture and your details. The full page should be visible on the picture.
passport.retakeImageContent: Are you happy with this picture? Please make sure it is well-lit and that you can read the information clearly.

address.title: Add proof of address
address.content: Now we need a picture of a utility bill, bank statement or any government letter (e.g. HMRC). Please make sure the document is recent (inside the past 3 months) and the address and your name are clearly visible.
address.retakeImageContent: Are you happy with this picture? Please make sure the date, your full name and address are clearly visible.

selfie.title: Take a picture of yourself
selfie.content: We need this picture so we can match it with the one in your passport. This is to make sure no one is trying to create a false account using your documents.
selfie.retakeImageContent: Are you happy with this picture? Please make sure the picture is well-lit and not blurred.

payment.title: Payment details
payment.intro: Please note that payment will not be taken and your subscription fee will not be charged until you pass the compliance check.

form.error: There was an issue with your payment
form.retakePaymentError: Your payment has failed. Please update your payment details so we can finalise your application

personalDetails.heading: Personal details
personalDetails.intro: These details are required to create your profile

form.dateOfBirthNote: You need to be 18 or over to use GetGround

progressTracker.confirmComplete: I am happy with all my details and confirm they are all correct.

form.success: Thanks! Your email has been submitted
form.error: Sorry we cannot subscribe you to our list right now, please try again later

annual.caption: Annual directors and officers insurance
annual.smallCaption: *Actual pricing depends on the value of your property

services.title: OPTIONAL SERVICES PRICING
services.firstContent: Our partners may charge a fee if you decide to use their mortgage, insurance, solicitor or property management services.
services.secondContent: We charge 0.2% of the property’s sale value if you buy or sell shares in companies holding property on the GetGround platform. You do not have to sell through us, this is an optional service.
